00020 #ifndef _XENO_ASM_PPC_CALIBRATION_H
00021 #define _XENO_ASM_PPC_CALIBRATION_H
00022 
00023 #include <xeno_config.h>
00024 #include <asm/delay.h>
00025 
00026 #define __bogomips (loops_per_jiffy/(500000/HZ))
00027 
00028 static inline unsigned long xnarch_get_sched_latency (void)
00029 
00030 {
00031 #if CONFIG_XENO_HW_SCHED_LATENCY != 0
00032 #define __sched_latency CONFIG_XENO_HW_SCHED_LATENCY
00033 #else
00034 
00035 #define __sched_latency 9500
00036 
00037 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_HW_SCHED_LATENCY */
00038 
00039     return __sched_latency;
00040 }
00041 
00042 #undef __sched_latency
00043 #undef __bogomips
00044 
00045 #endif /* !_XENO_ASM_PPC_CALIBRATION_H */
